name: Mini RC Rally: The World's Smallest Car Championship
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Burn mini-rubber with the world's smallest car championship.

Race through streets, mini golf courses, parks and other massively mis-scaled heart-pounding tracks as you test your driving skills against other drivers through wireless racing action.
  • 12 challenging tracks in realistic large scale
  • Match your skill in 6 incredible locations
  • Challenge up to 4 drivers in a wireless multi-card race
  • Trick out your customizable mini-racer
  • Grand Prix championship mode
  • Camera angles include 3rd person & drive-by view
